headline: The benefits is what keeps people around
pros: You will not find better benefits at another company. You get free lunch 3 days a week, 100% paid medical coverage for you and your family, annual bonus, matched retirement account, and unlimited time off
cons: This office has so many great people who work really hard but there is no investment in culture. The culture is so dry and dead. The people who are friends, stick together because they do things outside of work. I've seen people say hi to the CEO and he doesn't reply back because he is not approachable. If you quit, they will talk bad about you and make sure you feel uncomfortable right until your last day in the office.

headline: Excellent exposure for investment accounting
pros:
Working in a fast pace environment. You will always be busy.

Teams are hard working and are willing to help with specific projects. You'll learn a lot about 10-K's and private credit/CLO's
cons: If you cannot handle the fast pace setting its not for you.

headline: Leadership Issues
pros: Offers junior investment professionals a significant amount of deal evaluation experience (not an endorsement of the quality of experience).
cons: The tone at the top has created a toxic environment. Ownership controls by fear, willfully discourages firm-wide communication, and exhibits little to no respect for employees. With regards to investment performance and investment strategy, there is minimal consistency from leadership. The Investment Committee is dysfunctional and afraid to make decisions. If you take a job at Medley, prepare to be frustrated day in and day out.

headline: Do NOT Work Here
pros: Absolutely nothing is a pro when it comes to Medley.
cons:
Everything. 
This is the worst company that I have ever worked for. The office environment is extremely unprofessional and senior management has no clue what they are doing. They work everyone to the bone for minimal pay.  Facetime is more important than actual work time.  I gained zero experience working at this firm.

headline: Horrible Work Environment
